description: Episode of Series "Alligator Rivers Region". The second film in a series looking at the work of the Supervising Scientist following the Fox Report on Uranium mining in the Kakadu National Park region of the Northern Territory. To monitor possible problems, scientific studies were carried out before work began. Shows some of the field work and by the use of interviews examines possible problems which could occur.
